comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

i click on the update and the pop up status bar just keeps on streaming like it's thinking and it never completes it's task. 


Actual results:

pop up continues everyday a couple times during my time on the computer


Expected results:

the update should process and the update pop up should go away.
